interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Dog of Flanders VHS Review Date: 2001/09/14 Store: David Ladd (Actor), Donald Crisp (Actor), James B. Clark (Director) & 0 more Rated: Unrated Format: VHS Tape Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Kids & Family Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.32 x 4.19 x 1.12 inches; 6.13 Ounces', 'Director': 'James B. Clark', 'Run time': '1 hour and 36 minutes', 'Release date': 'February 24, 1998', 'Date First Available': 'February 9, 2007', 'Actors': 'David Ladd, Donald Crisp, Theodore Bikel, Max Croiset, Monique Ahrens', 'Studio': 'Paramount', 'Producers': 'Robert B. Radnitz', 'Writers': 'Ouida, Ted Sherdeman'} Review Text: I love the Dog of Flanders. I saw the movie of the same title made several years ago. Then at my library I found this older edition and was so pleased when I found it still in print and available .... The older edition is different abit from the newer version; however I love both stories.
It is a classic of the highest standards. The original book has a sad ending and I am glad the movies are more joyful!
Excellent movies for children to see, especially any children with artistic talent! Enjoy! Review Title: Dog of Flanders older version Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Travel Yugoslavia:Adriatic Coast [VHS] Rated: NR Format: VHS Tape Movies & TV, Movies {'Format': 'Color, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Travel Series', 'Runtime': '30 minutes', 'Package Dimensions': '7.32 x 4.19 x 1.12 inches; 6.13 Ounces', 'Run time': '30 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 13, 1991', 'Date First Available': 'September 29, 2006', 'Actors': 'Travel Series', 'Studio': 'Victory Multimedia C', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'} This is an older film made prior to the end of the war in '95.
However, the scenery is beautiful. Shows most of the larger cities on the Adriatic Coastline in what is now Croatia, with a few southern cities as well.
Good, basic information. Does not really show the magnificent beauty of the Adriatic Sea.
I do enjoy it and brings back the wonderful memories I have from my visit there in 2000.
Thank you for offering this video for sale. I hope you offer more on Croatia in the future. Adriatic Coast Dog of Flanders VHS David Ladd (Actor), Donald Crisp (Actor), James B. **User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests:** The user maintains a strong interest in travel-related media, particularly focusing on historical and scenic content, but has also shown appreciation for classic films that evoke emotional responses.
  
- **Preferences:** This user prefers VHS format, indicating a nostalgia for older media and a preference for the physical experience associated with it.

- **Content Focus:** Enjoys travel documentaries or films showcasing specific geographic locations, especially coastal regions. Recent interactions suggest a growing interest in classic children's stories and narratives promoting artistic appreciation.

- **Emotional Connection:** Values personal experiences and memories connected to travel and media, highlighting the emotional resonance of films, particularly those with uplifting themes and artistic content.

- **Desire for More Content:** Expresses a desire for additional materials related to specific regions (like Croatia) while also enjoying the nostalgic charm of older films, emphasizing a diverse appetite for content that tells compelling stories.

- **Rating Behavior:** Tends to give high ratings for content that resonates personally, reflecting a positive and supportive approach to media consumption. The user appreciates well-crafted narratives, whether rooted in travel experiences or classic storytelling.

Overall, the user exhibits a clear affinity for both nostalgic travel-related films and timeless tales that offer emotional depth, beauty, and cultural insights.
